mapper.select: SELECT fat_judg_cd /* fat_judg_cd 비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,fn_getCdNm('FAT_JUDG_CD', fat_judg_cd) as fat_judg_nm ,fidx_fr /* fidx_fr 비만지수_FROM numeric */ ,fidx_to /* fidx_to 비만지수_TO numeric */ ,curr_eval_cntn /* curr_eval_cntn 현재_평가_내용 character varying(100) */ ,prdt_eval_cntn /* prdt_eval_cntn 예측_평가_내용 character varying(4000) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_fat_judg_stnd WHERE fat_judg_cd LIKE CONCAT (#{fatJudgCd}, '%') /* ment_strs_stat_cd 정신적_스트레스_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
